effect.celestial_awakening.purging_light: Upon expiring, removes a random buff and damages the afflicted depending on the number of debuffs on them.
effect.celestial_awakening.lunar_restora: Periodically repairs worn armor and items held in either hand.
effect.celestial_awakening.lunar_renewal: (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET)Instantly repairs worn armor and items held in either hand.
effect.celestial_awakening.photosynthesi: Periodically grants small amounts of hunger.
effect.celestial_awakening.moon_curse.de: Healing too fast causes the afflicted to take damage.
effect.celestial_awakening.mark_of_haunt: Not good for your mental health.
A buff bestowed by the Remnant armor set.
advancement.celestial_awakening.material: There are a wide variety of materials to discover.
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_l: Let the remains of an animal degrade into raw life energy
Harvest a powerful resource from an aquatic creature infused with moonlight
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_m: Follow the guidance of the moon and uncover a precious stone
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_s: Find a fragment of solar energy concealed in vegetation
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_o: Relieve a predator of its powerful hide
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_d: Rescue the remnants of a star from its captor
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_m: Observe the transformation of a common metal
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_s: What doesn't destroy you makes you stronger.
advancement.celestial_awakening.obtain_g:
Steps to make an iron-rich plate.
1. Take your filling (ideally at least 1 cubic meter) and put it between 2 rock-hard shells. Make sure that these shells are seared for extra crunch.
2. Add one non-scorched shell to each end of the sandwich.
3. Smash all of them together, ideally with a metal tool to really hammer it all in.
advancement.celestial_awakening.spotted_: Catch the attention of an otherworldly entity
Emerge victorious from a duel with a phantom knight
enchantment.celestial_awakening.gaia_lin: While holding a shield which is not being used nor is on cooldown, reduce incoming damage by 5% per level.
enchantment.celestial_awakening.gaia_rem: While holding a shield that is on cooldown, reduce incoming damage by 3% per level.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.life_frag: Surround food with 4 fragments to give the food a minor healing effect.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.life_frag_fo: Infused with life, heals the user for %s HP upon consumption.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.lunar_scale: Can be combined with gear in a crafting table to restore a small amount of durability.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.lunula_rock: An upgrade component for certain gear.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.luna_tome: A book with significantly increased enchantability.
tooltip_celestial_awakening_cosmic_pearl: (DO NOT USE, NOT FULLY WORKING)Like an enderpearl, but consumes 10 hunger points and all of your saturation instead of health.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.midnight_iro:
At night, this item will not lose durability.
Furthermore, it gains increased attack speed, damage, and mining speed.
Executing a fully charged attack will launch a projectile based on the hit type: a vertical strike if the attack is a critical hit, or a horizontal wave otherwise.
Strike and Wave each have independent cooldowns of %s seconds.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.moonlight_re:
Kills restore hunger and saturation, and grant 1 Lunar Orb (up to 6).
Each Lunar Orb reduces the cooldown of Strike and Wave by 0.25 seconds.
At 6 orbs, summon 2 weaker crescents when performing a Strike or Wave.
Lose 1 Lunar Orb 10 seconds after not gaining or losing an orb.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.sun_staff.fl:
Deals a burst of fire damage to nearby enemies.
Cooldown of 5.5 seconds
tooltip.celestial_awakening.sun_staff.ra:
Summons a ray in the direction you are looking at.
Upon colliding with an entity or block, the ray detonates, dealing damage to enemies and healing allies within a 2 block range of the entire ray.
Cooldown of 11 seconds
tooltip.celestial_awakening.fluorescent_: Upon nocking an arrow, reveal all nearby enemies that aren't invisible.
When the arrow hits a target, reveal and damage all entities near the target.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.star_gazer.b:
When the arrow hits a target, deal bonus damage if the target is glowing and heal slightly if the target is on fire.
This effect is applied before Revealing Shot.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.seared_stone: Upgrade this tool in a smithing table to unlock more abilities
Does not lose durability if below 10% durability, but reduced bonus mining speed from Earthlink.
Upon hitting an entity, damages and slows all entities behind the target.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.everlight_ar: The armor shudders as it struggles to contain the blinding light within.
Upon killing an enemy, ignite nearby enemies and gain absorption.

Applies glowing to attackers.
If the attacker cannot receive glowing, instead heal 0.2 HP.
Reduces incoming damage for each nearby glowing entity.

While in combat, channel the power of light.
  If you are above half health, ignite nearby enemies and deal a burst of additional fire damage.
  If below half health, reduce the duration of burning and glowing effects on nearby entities. You are healed based on the total time removed across all targets.
Cooldown of 12 seconds.
While at full HP, gain %s damage reduction.

Taking fall damage will trigger dropshock, causing any damage from that fall to be dealt to nearby enemies instead.
Cooldown of 7.5 seconds.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.knightmare_s: Upon killing an enemy, gain %s base damage for every 10 HP the enemy had. This effect lasts for 15 seconds.

Hitting an enemy applies Honor Duel to the user and the enemy.
Increases the damage dealt to the afflicted enemy.
Decreases damage dealt and taken from other enemies.
Honor Duel is removed if the user or the target is killed, or if the linked entities are too far from each other.
An entity can only be linked with one Honor Duel at a time.
Chance to gain special items upon breaking surface blocks or fishing up items.

When attacked, creates a comet that follows the wearer.
After a short delay, the comet will launch towards the nearest enemy.
If no enemy present, the comet is consumed to heal the user slightly.
Receive a buff at night depending on the moon phase.
Refunds a portion of materials used in villager trades.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.radiant_armo: Obtain special materials upon gathering crops or killing animals.

Speeds up the growth of nearby plants.
Speeds up the growth and breeding recovery period of animals.
tooltip.celestial_awakening.remnant_armo: The armor emits a dull light. Perhaps you can fuel it with certain materials.

Upon falling below 20% of your max HP due to an attack, gain increased attack damage, attack speed, and damage reduction for 5 seconds.
Cooldown of 2 minutes.

Landing a critical hit will pull in nearby enemies and deal 40% of the hit's damage to them.
Cooldown of 7 seconds
tooltip.celestial_awakening.scorched_sui:
Increases damage dealt to burning enemies.
Increases mining speed if your tool exceeds the tier requirement to break a block.
Increases armor points, armor toughness, and mining speed the lower the wearer's y level is.
Each instance of damage taken is delayed by 5 seconds.
When an instance of damage is dealt, the amount is reduced based on how far the wearer is from when they were hit.
Increases damage dealt based on distance from the target.
The armor emits an aura of unnatural hunger. You feel as though you should satiate it.

Hitting a target at full HP will deal an additional %s damage.
Cooldown of %s seconds, reduces cooldown by %s seconds on kill.

Bringing an enemy below 50% max HP will grant a speed boost to the wearer.
Cooldown of 15 seconds, resets on kill.

Getting hit will apply Weakness 2 to the attacker for 3 seconds.
Furthermore, all nearby entities will take damage and be inflicted with Weakness 1 for 2 seconds.
Cooldown of 8 seconds
